message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-3-2, translated into en
data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.3 Mobilize additional financial resources from various sources for developing countries17.3.2 Volume of migrant worker remittances (in United States dollars) as a share of total GDP5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMBank of the Republic of Burundi (BRB)NIZIGIYIMANA FerdinandStatistical serviceSDG focal point within the BRB61260968fnizigiyimana@yahoo.frVolume of migrant worker remittances (in US dollars) as a share of total GDP%Financial database of the Bank of the Republic of Burundi and ISTEEBU, Economic Accounts of Burundi, 2014Administrative dataannualannualBRB / ISTEEBUThe BRB is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelThe BRB is the body recognized by the Burundian governmentThis indicator is relevant.Volume of migrant worker remittances (in US dollars) as a share of total GDPannualAvailable nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level2017
